summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 11.8°C) and outside temperature (down 11.6°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 11%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 12134 lux) and cloud levels (up 358 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 16414 lux), the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 243 m), and outside humidity (down 6%) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; prepare for cold, chilly weather ahead. Also, dry air conditions likely prevail and slight breezes. Possible light showers, overcast skies with low cloud, and it’s dark. Similar weather conditions should remain.
